name: @framersai/codex
description: Frame Codex - a structured public knowledge corpus for LLM/RAG.

scripts.blocks:all: npm run blocks:process && npm run blocks:tag && npm run build:index

scripts-info.index: Build search index with NLP-powered auto-categorization (uses SQL cache for incremental updates)
scripts-info.build:search: Generate BM25 postings + semantic embeddings for Frame.dev search
scripts-info.validate: Validate all content against schemas and quality rules
scripts-info.check-duplicates: Detect duplicate content across the repository
scripts-info.generate-template: Generate a new strand template with UUID
scripts-info.blocks:process: Parse markdown into blocks and calculate worthiness scores
scripts-info.blocks:tag: Generate tag suggestions for all blocks using NLP
scripts-info.blocks:ai: AI-enhance block tags using LLM (requires API key)
scripts-info.blocks:migrate: One-time migration to process all existing strands
scripts-info.blocks:all: Run full block processing pipeline (process → tag → index)
scripts-info.prepare: Install git hooks for pre-commit validation
